description: NoAGI is a chat assistant that can use and combine the most advanced AI technologies with natural language requests to assist you. Give it the 'what', it will figure out the 'how'.
title: NoAGI
introduction: NoAGI is a platform designed to provide advanced notification and alert systems for websites and applications. It offers customizable toast notifications that can be styled and positioned according to user preferences.
features: Support for light and dark themes
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
Rich color options for different notification types
Animation support for showing and hiding notifications
Accessibility features like focus-visible and reduced motion support
targetPeople: Web developers, UI/UX designers, and application developers
